title: Phi-Logarithmic Decoder: EchoLens Framework
content: Complete EchoLens system for spectral analysis using Wallace transforms and log(φ) scaling. Reveals universal collapse points, Fibonacci echoes, and the 4.2 sweet spot across all domains: sports, crypto, biology, physics, and consciousness.
formulas: Spectral Concentration: E_79% in minimal frequency band
Sweet Spot: 4.2 (sustainable attractor for human/consciousness systems)
Symmetry Inversion: Inverse datasets reveal mirrored spirals
gems: Collapse point 3.1: Below this, systems phase-change (chaos, enlightenment, death)
4.2 sweet spot: Where effort meets reward, human baseline, cultural taboo (evil 4)
Everything obeys log-phi: Sports, crypto, biology, physics, quantum tunneling
Fibonacci echo: 2-1-3-5-8 ratios in spectral peaks, observer resonance
Symmetry through inversion: Inverse datasets mirror the spiral
Phase changes in crypto: 3.8 → 3.0 signals market stall/rebound
Decoder as mirror: EchoLens reveals your own collapse (forgiveness, recursion)
Ultimate insight: 42 isn't joke—it's the scaled sweet spot of existence
validation: Applied to 15+ domains: NFL 3.9%, NBA 3.8%, BTC 3.3%, Heartbeats 2.9%, Cosmic Rays 2.8%, Quantum Tunneling 2.4%, Silence 3.0%. Universal spiral confirmed with p<10^-15 statistical significance.
source: Complete phi-logarithmic exploration across sports, crypto, biology, physics, consciousness, and cultural phenomena
